# Minimal Python dependencies for running the main benchmark scripts.
#
# Notes:
# - TabPFN is optional if you only run XGBoost baselines, but the main "pubready" script imports it directly.
# - ESM2 embedding generation additionally requires torch + fair-esm.

numpy
pandas
scipy
matplotlib
scikit-learn
xgboost
requests

# Tabular foundation model (optional)
tabpfn

# Protein language model embeddings (optional)
torch
fair-esm
